entry.title: [GRA7][PaaS] - Maintenance operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 1, 20:00 - 21:00 UTC

Oct 21, 15:37 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 01/11/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 01/11/2022 21:00 UTC
Service Impact : Console User Interface, Git and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours.
Service improvement : Our partner will perform maintenance in the GRA7 region to release the latest underlying software upgrade.
All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.

End time : 27/10/2022 22:00 UTC

entry.title: [GRA7][PaaS] - New release
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 27, 17:00 UTC  -  Oct 28, 01:00 UTC

Oct 8, 12:33 UTC
Update - Please note the new start date for maintenance:
Start time : 27/10/2022 17:00 UTC
End time : 28/10/2022 01:00 UTC

Sep 20, 20:11 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/10/2022 17:00 UTC
End time : 14/10/2022 01:00 UTC
Service impact : At one point each project will be reallocated resulting in a short interruption. Integrations and WebHooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that they will be doing an internal maintenance in order to release the latest features, bug fixes, and performance updates.

entry.title: [Global][xDSL/FTTH] - Internet access monitoring
entry.content:
Oct 24, 14:47 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/10/2022 8:45 UTC
End Time : 24/10/2022 14:45 UTC
Service impact : Iincident is now over. The access incident notifications you may receive are now legitimate
Root cause : An hardware and network configuration incident caused this malfunction in our monitoring system.

Oct 24, 11:02 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/10/2022 8:45 UTC
Service impact : Customers that have activated the monitoring on their access might receive an email indicating that their access is down. But this is may not be the case.
Sorry for the inconvenience caused.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem

Please note that the current maintenance can take place 24/24.

entry.title: [Spain][VoIP] - Outage
entry.content:
Oct 19, 10:09 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 17/10/2022 08:46 UTC
End Time : 19/10/2022 09:00 UTC
Our teams and the spanish provider resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Investigating - Start time : 17/10/2022 08:46 UTC

Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
